artist: Andy Baird; Mike Brehm; Robert Corbit; Frank Gaard; Janet Groenert; Mike McCoy; Bill McKearn; Greg Miller; Rick Noble; Craig Smith; Jennifer Sobin; Melissa Stang; Terre van Haren; Tim Walton; Coleen West; Jon West; Published by Artpolice
description: 12 pages ,saddle-stapled; black and white publication with letters "Artpolice" across top; the letter "O" contains a small child's face; design features a large turtle whose front legs have webbed fingers and whose back legs are arms with hands; there is a large mask-like face on the turtle's back
title: Artpolice International, Vol. 1
